houses.title: Osawa Sein lub...
houses.title2: Private Group Stay in Exclusive Fairytale Castle
houses.description: This fairy tale castle embodies a timeless Scanadavian aesthetic; including grand windows for ample natural light. While here, take advantage of the new custom-designed Finnish Sauna and expansive 85 sqm. Yoga Salon. The 65 sqm. main-floor Kitchen is a delight for foodies and cooks, while the professional sound equipment, understated yet elegant dance floor and bar area complete every party. Enjoy the 4 Ha. historical park with exotic trees, ample shade, and large terrace for group gatherings.
houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit

houses.title: Capriva del Friuli
houses.title2: Junior Suite Castello di Spessa
houses.description: OSPITI DEL CASTELLO DI SPESSA Con una storia lunga quasi otto secoli, il Castello di Spessa ha ospitato famiglie di prestigio come Giacomo Casanova e Lorenzo Da Ponte. Tutte le camere -immerse nella quiete del parco del castello con vista sulle colline- sono climatizzate e con accesso WI-FI gratuito, dotate di TV a schermo piatto, cassaforte, minibar, Docce spaziose, sacco con trapuntino
houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit

houses.title: Cagli, Marche
houses.title2: Castello di Naro in esclusiva
houses.description: Curato nei minimi dettagli, il Castello di Naro è una location suggestiva ed elegante, ideale per organizzare eventi privati, culturali e aziendali o per trascorrere una vacanza, riservando in esclusiva il Castello fino a dieci ospiti.Uno spazio versatile e capace di valorizzare i vostri momenti, regalandovi un’esperienza sempre unica ed emozionante.
houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit

houses.title: Porvoo
houses.title2: Fairytale castle ensuite private room with balcony
houses.description: There are total 4 bedrooms in the castle, this is a very spacy private bedroom with own bathroom suitable for 2. Small baby can share the same bed with parents - we donot charge extra for this. This memorable place is anything but ordinary. It's located 50 mins drive from Helsinki downtown & airport.
houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit

houses.title: Vittorio Venetto
houses.title2: A whole medieval castle for you
houses.description: A whole medieval castle for up 8 people in Vittorio Veneto,Treviso A set of 3 units enclosed by a Medieval Castle. The best for a family reunion or a group of friends. Located on the top of the hill the Castle offers a panorama of Medieval roofs, and the view of beautiful mountains. It’s an excellent departure point for visits to Veneto art towns, and/or for hiking or biking excursions in the near Dolomites.
houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit

houses.title: Montegiove Um..
houses.title2: Old Castle Olive Mill

houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit

houses.title: Vico Equense, Ca..
houses.title2: Sleep in a Castle on the Sorrento Coast!
houses.description: Imagine visiting the amazing south of Italy and living a dream life in a real castle with breath taking views on the magnificent mediterranean sea. Oh wait, you can! This gorgeous location is the perfect spot to enjoy the Sorrento Coast in the most iconic way. The Castle features a private pool, beach club and on site restaurant. The flat is fully equipped with air conditioning, kitchenette and a post card view from the
houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit

houses.title: Mikra Mintinia
houses.title2: Entire Castle, Amazing Sea View and Swimming Pool
houses.description: Cobble tower, with a spacious guesthouse, only 1km from the beach Allow the old, rare, stylish decoration to travel you through time, while our beloved garden offers you its serenity,as well as its fruits and vegetables Relax on the porch ,enjoying unique sunsets in the gulf. In a radius of 2km you may find places to shop,dine or go out,while you are only 10km away from Kalamata city.
houses.host: Private room in resort hosted by Pranit
